item.title: Adam Back
item.description: Adam Back New Context Conference 2016 http://dg717.com/ncc/en/ We are using a hashtag to organize the information today. The hashtag we’re using is nccblockchain. Ncc stands for new conference context. That’s where we are. Blockchain is what we’re talkin gabout. Can I ask the people in the back to take a seat? We’re about to get ready. Meet the neighbor near your seat. Switch your cellphone off. I am going to demonstrate.
